column4: can anyone help me set up clone view between my lcd and tv? whatever i do with xort.conf, i end up with my monitor displaying 640x480 and my tv displaying nothing
help setting up clone view please
what video card?
nvidia 6600
sorry. i got it going with ati. not familiar with nvidia
do you have al ine saiyng   Option         "TVFormat" "NTSC-M"   in /etc/X11/xorg.conf?
so it's there? i haven't looked, will now
actually no :S where can i add it?
http://paste.ubuntu.com/27542/
you may need to use    PAL  instead
i have a section named monitor with the line ModelName "TV-0" in, and under the Device section i have only identifier, driver and option, maybe i should configure the Monitor section instead?
how about i paste my entire xorg and you take a look?
ok
http://paste.ubuntu.com/27543/
this might work    http://paste.ubuntu.com/27544/
is there a way to restart x without restarting?
ctrl+alt+backspace
no luck, i had to restore to a backup again, it completely forgot even what card driver to use
yeah i figured something was wrong when you were gone so long..  i have ati card not real familiar with nvidia
do you maybe have some ideas where to look for an answer? i've tried everything i found on google, still no color
channel    #nvidia    they might know
okay thanx
